enWisdom: The most intelligent of you is the most submissive of you
The most intelligent of people is the most submissive of them to Allah, the Glorified
The most intelligent of people is the closest of them to Allah
The most intelligent person is one who follows the wise people
The most intelligent person is the virtuous, fearful one
The most intelligent of people is the one who forgives [and accepts the excuses of] others the most

Wisdom: أَعْقَلُ النَّاسِ أَبْعَدُهُمْ عَنْ كُلِّ دَنِيَّةٍ
enWisdom: The most intelligent of people is the farthest of them from all vile things

Wisdom: أَعْقَلُ النَّاسِ مَنْ كَانَ بِعَيْبِهِ بَصِيراً وَعَنْ عَيْبِ غَيْرِهِ ضَرِيراً
enWisdom: The most intelligent of people is one who sees his own fault and is blind to the fault of others

Wisdom: أَعْقَلُ النَّاسِ مَنْ لَا يَتَجَاوَزُ الصَّمْتَ فِي عُقُوبَةِ الْجُهَّالِ
enWisdom: The most intelligent of people is the one who does not go beyond silence in punishing the ignorant

Wisdom: أَعْقَلُ النَّاسِ مَنْ غَلَبَ جِدُّهُ هَزْلَهُ وَاسْتَظْهَرَ عَلَى هَوَاهُ بِعَقْلِهِ
enWisdom: The most intelligent of people is one whose seriousness overpowers his frivolity and who overcomes his vain desire with his intellect

Wisdom: أَعْقَلُ النَّاسِ مَنْ ذَلَّ لِلْحَقِّ فَأَعْطَاهُ مِنْ نَفْسِهِ وَعَزَّ بِالْحَقِّ فَلَمْ يُهِنْ إِقَامَتَهُ [عَنْ إِقَامَتِهِ‏] وَحُسْنَ الْعَمَلِ بِهِ
enWisdom: The most intelligent of people is one who is humbled in front of the truth so he submits himself to it, and is honoured by the truth so he does not undermine its establishment and acting upon it with goodness
The most intelligent of people is the one who is most considering of the consequences [of actions]
The highest degree of intelligence is admitting to [one’s] ignorance
